summary:
### Chunk unknown — unknown

k if a file exists
check_file() {
    if [ -f "$1" ]; then
        echo "✅ File exists: $1"
        echo "File size: $(du -h "$1" | cut -f1)"
    else
        echo "❌ File does not exist: $1"
    fi
    echo ""
}

# Check main directories
echo "--- Checking main directories ---"
check_dir "."
check_dir "./scripts"
check_dir "./prompts"
check_dir "./outputs"
check_dir "./outputs/chunks"
check_dir "./outputs/summaries"
check_dir "./codebase"
